text: Su'aiba mhanale, he majhya jatibandhavanno! Paha, jara mi apalya palanakartyatarphe spasta pramanasaha ahe ani tyane apalyakaduna cangali roji (annasamugri) de'una thevali ahe. Majhi kadhihi hi iccha nahi ki tumhala mana'i karuna svatah tya gostikade jhukave jicyapasuna tumhala rokhata ahe. Majha irada tara apalya kuvatinusara sudharana karanyacaca ahe, ani majhi subud'dhi (tauphika) allahacyaca madatine ahe. Tyacyavaraca majha bharosa ahe, ani tyacyakadeca mala paratuna jayace ahe
